Product Title: Hair Tinsel Strands Sparkling Shiny Glitter Dazzle Bling 100CM 17 Color 2500 Strands Heat Resistant Hair Extensions Christmas Gift For Kid Party Party Highlights (40 Inch, 17 Colors Hair Tinsel)
Review Date: 2021/11/06
Store: Ithadnam
Average Rating: 3.7
Product Details: {'Brand': 'Ithadnam', 'Hair Type': 'Color', 'Material Feature': 'Natural', 'Package Dimensions': '12.48 x 9.53 x 1.06 inches; 5.93 Ounces', 'UPC': '781509670498'}
Review Text: These do not stay when you tie them in. No matter what method you use, they just come right out. They come in a big pack but forget trying to get them to stay in if you tie them onto your hair directly.
Review Title: Impossible to tie in
Rating: 3.0

Loose Face Powder Long Lasting and Waterproof Oil Control Moisturizing Setting Powder Makeup 1.76 Oz
Marine Forest
{'Brand': 'Marine Forest', 'Item Form': 'Powder', 'Finish Type': 'Natural', 'Coverage': 'Light', 'Product Benefits': 'Moisturizing', 'Package Dimensions': '2.76 x 2.76 x 1.57 inches; 3.17 Ounces', 'UPC': '762403411509'}
The powder itself is very matte and smooths out skin. It is also soft to run your hand across. The packaging is square which is so unnecessary and creates issues with taking the lid off. I hurt my hand every time I take the lid off because it sticks to the corners.
Powder is good, packaging is horrible

TIANG
{'Brand': 'TIANG', 'Item Form': 'Liquid, Oil, Lotion, Spray', 'Unit Count': '1.00 Count', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Use for': 'Face', 'Product Dimensions': '7.09 x 1.61 x 1.61 inches; 6.17 Ounces', 'UPC': '757249753050'}
I LOVE this product! It is great for summer and spring or really any hot day of the year! It is super easy to fill up! You just put a little bit of water I'm a little bottle on the top of the sprayer. Then you hold the button and boom! It provides mist, and air if you leave the bottle empty! It is a amazing color and an amazing product! Perfect gift and perfect product! I really recommend this!
Super easy to fill up and super refreshing!

profile:
**Updated User Profile Summary:**

The user maintains a strong focus on personal care products that enhance skin health and comfort, particularly favoring gentle exfoliation and soothing solutions. Their interest in makeup, especially lip products, reflects a sensitivity-oriented approach, preferring subdued tones suitable for delicate skin. Recently, they expressed enthusiasm for elevating their skincare routine with user-friendly options, highlighting a facial steamer that enhances comfort during warmer months.

While continuing to seek versatile makeup that promotes a natural appearance with moisturizing benefits, they have raised concerns about packaging usability, indicating a desire for designs that enhance the overall self-care experience. This critique reinforces their commitment to innovative skincare solutions smoothly integrated into their routine.

In a recent interaction, the user explored hair accessories, indicating a willingness to experiment with fun and vibrant options to enhance their style. However, their experience was disappointing due to difficulties in usability and practicality, as the products failed to stay in place despite various methods of application. This underscores their broader philosophy of prioritizing effective, user-friendly items in their grooming regimen.

Overall, the user remains dedicated to discovering soothing and versatile products that cater to their sensitivity needs, emphasizing a holistic approach to skincare and makeup that prioritizes comfort and usability while enhancing their daily self-care practices.
